articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan head of State 
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on March 1 sent a message of greetings to colonel Moammer El Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of the 26th anniversary of the proclamation of Jamahiriya in Libya.
 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too, and wished him greater success in his work for building a free and prosperous new society.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cyprus 
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on February 27 sent a message of greetings to Tassos Papadopoulos on his election as president of Cyprus.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two peoples would continue to grow stronger, the message wished him great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and the settlement of the Cyprus issue.

articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian President
    Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Bulgarian President Georgi Parvanov on the occasion of the National Day of Bulgaria.
 He in the message expressed conviction that the bilateral relations would continue to develop on good terms and wished the president and people of Bulgaria success in their work for the prosperity of the country.
